name: Memory Lapse
description:
Memory Lapse is a futuristic 3D platformer and a third person shooter in which the player can travel through time using portal.

Defeat the cyborg, complete all the 3 level of memory lapse and become a time master!

Game Design : DARVES Erwan.

Programmer : DARVES Erwan, ROCHAT Coline, LEHUBY Arnaud.
